spec_data.Name: perl-RPC-XML
spec_data.Description:
The RPC::XML package is an implementation of XML-RPC. The module provides
classes for sample client and server implementations, a server designed as an
Apache location-handler, and a suite of data-manipulation classes that are
used by them.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:27:41 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Set of classes for core data, message and XML handling
